content.rendered:
001. Contact
002. Affiliates
003. Become Affiliates

Owner: Luciana
Site name: Adoring Sandra
Opened: July 06, 2002
Domains: https://sandra-bullock.net

Adoring Sandra is an unofficial fan site dedicated to the talented American actress Sandra Bullock. We have a large gallery with original screencaptures, magazine scans, event pictures and more, we offer media downloads, detailed information and the latest news on Mrs Bullock and her career… With hopefully many more features to come! We strive to bring you an informative, often updated and fun fansite without being intrusive of Sandra’s personal life.

This site is not official. We don’t have any connection with Sandra or her management. We’re just fans, making a website to show our support for this talented actress. Don’t send any e-mails to Sandra, because she won’t receive them. They will only be deleted.

… Read the disclaimer
